item.title: Dark Fiber Community Builds Infrastructure
item.description: There’s a narrative circulating that our infrastructure is failing. While this might be true in some areas, a massive construction project is currently underway to create a robust fiber optic network across the nation. This “nervous system” for information technology promises practically limitless, low-lag bandwidth for the foreseeable future. This surge in fiber optic infrastructure isn’t driven by failing systems, but rather by existing infrastructure reaching full capacity. The late 20th century witnessed a fiber optic boom, which initially seemed excessive when the tech bubble burst.
